description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dvhr7","text":"Here we describe a protocol to detect specific proteins by immunofluorescence on cells cultured as monolayers. The protocol has been tested on primary cortical neurons and primary astrocytes isolated from mouse cortical tissues.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"1md5c","text":"This protocol has been tested for primary astrocytes and cortical neurons cultured in 4- or 8-well chambers slides. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1q444","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arhjc","text":"For astrocytes, coat slides with Poly-D, L-lysine hydrobromide (PDLL) (Sigma #P9011)\u2028 for 1 hour at 37C and then wash twice with H2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emduv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqduq","text":"For cortical neurons, coat with Poly-l-ornithine: Cat. #: P3655, Sigma and Laminin: Cat. #: L2020, Sigma for 2 hours at 37C. Perform 2 quick rinses with 1X PBS. Do not let the slides dry. Keep the slides well submerged in 1X PBS at RT until plating. Aspirate PBS and perform 2 quick rinses with ddH2O right before plating.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf159","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2cj1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44v99","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"buglv","text":"Fixation. Aspirate culture media and wash once with ice-cold 1X PBS. Add 4% Formaldehyde fixation buffer. Incubate at room temperature (RT) for 15 min. Use an orbital shaker using low speed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bg7iv","text":"Wash 3 times with ice-cold PBS. Incubate for 5 min on the orbital shaker at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgrk2","text":"Wash 1 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bicj","text":"Wash 2 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5pgv","text":"Wash 3 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eodeq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3abfv","text":"3X Washes: Ice-cold PBS for 5 min (Incubate at RT, Orbital shaker)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aiee1","text":"Wash 1 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dsm9","text":"Wash 2 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apl38","text":"Wash 3 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ceeb","text":"Blocking: Add 600uL of 100% Superblocking Buffer. Incubate at RT for 1h with orbital shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ak89m","text":"Primary antibody hybridization: Dilute antibody in antibody hybridization buffer. Incubate o/n at 4℃  or 1 hour at RT using an orbital shaker  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c5gj","text":"Suggested volumes: 600μL/well for 4-wells \u0026 300μL/well for 8-wells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69kb0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jc5j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pb60","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f37ns","text":"Remove Primary Ab hybridization buffer. Antibodies can be stored at 4C and re-used. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"o55r","text":"3X Washes: Ice-cold PBS for 5 min (Incubate at RT, Orbital shaker)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"at1dg","text":"Wash 1 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e612i","text":"Wash 2 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vti6","text":"Wash 3 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0ia6","text":"Secondary antibody hybridization: Dilute secondary antibody in antibody hybridization buffer. Incubate at RT for 1 hr using an orbital shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5g48e","text":"Suggested volumes: 500μL per well for a 4-well slide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db98k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qgdj","text":"Secondary antibodies are coupled with fluorophores. Perform these steps in the dark using dark chambers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":103}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2ule","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a58q2","text":"3X Washes: Ice-cold PBS for 5 min (Incubate at RT, Orbital shaker)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1i24","text":"Wash 1 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56c51","text":"Wash 2 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4i195","text":"Wash 3 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gau3","text":"Stain every well with Hoechst 33342 diluted 1:1000 in PBS. Incubate at RT for 3 min on an orbital shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6camk","text":"3X Washes: Ice-cold PBS for 5 min (Incubate at RT, Orbital shaker)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dal6f","text":"Wash 1 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtung","text":"Wash 2 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qbr9","text":"Wash 3 ロ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aat20","text":"Remove silicone gaskets from the glass slides.  With a Kimwipe, remove the excess of PBS without touching the surface with the cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7fcak","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"465f4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b3hbu","text":"Spread ~200uL of Prolong Glass antifade mounting medium across the whole slide. Slowly cover the glass slide with a glass coverslip and avoid making air bubbles. Seal the coverslip to the slide with clear nail polish","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bem0g","text":"Let the slides dry for 24 hr at RT in the dark before the fluorescent microscopy analysis image. For long-term storage, keep the slides at 4℃ in dark chambers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0vbo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"elnug","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a88qt","text":"Permeabilization: Add 500uL of 0.3% Triton in PBS per well (for 8-wells, reduce to 250uL), incubate at RT 5 min on the orbital shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
